Company Overview.Name: Apex Frozen Foods Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Apex Frozen Foods is an integrated producer and exporter of shelf-stable quality aquaculture products.  The company’s operations comprise hatchery, farming, pre-processing, processing, and exporting of shelf-stable quality aquaculture products like shrimp.  They produce variants of processed White shrimp (L. Vannamei) and Black Tiger shrimp (P. Monodon), sold under customer-owned brands and their own brands (Bay Fresh, Bay Harvest, and Bay Premium). They also manufacture ready-to-eat shrimp products (20% of FY22 revenue).
Company Overview.Market Position: One of the leading producers and exporters of processed shrimp.
